        a new output stream object that encodes the source stream.

      • getEncodedMetadata

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getEncodedMetadata()
        Encodes the object's metadata. Usually, this is called after the output stream has been closed to get the updated object metadata but could also somehow transform existing metadata like encrypting it.
        Returns:
        the "encoded" metadata

      • getTransformConfig

        public java.lang.String getTransformConfig()
        Gets this transformation's mode string, e.g. "COMP:LZMA/3"
        Returns:
        the mode string.
